1b1('bum): 'byor 'de lnga ste dper na/ sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin
2a1('bum): gnas me nga ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin
2a2('bum): tu rnam pa ra dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med de// bzad
2a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la ma
2b1('bum): gnas med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu ben pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas medo// 
2b2('bum): bsar dani gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam pa dag la mtshan ma'i gnas me // shes rab kyi
2b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa shi na rnam par dag la mtshan ma'i gnas med/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
2b4('bum): ngang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
2b5('bum): dnga'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nang stong pa
3a1('bum): na nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// phyi stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag
3a2('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
3a3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// chen po stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// 
3a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par
3a5('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// mtha' lnga
3a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par
3b1('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
3b2('bum): ma'i gnas med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag
3b3('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rna
3b4('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas me do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
3b5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
3b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag
3b7('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// yang dag par spong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shin tu rnam par dag pa
3b8('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do// dbang po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// stobs shin tu rnam pa dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// 
4a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu rnam pa
4a2('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
4a3('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// bsam gang na
4a4('bum): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// tshad med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
4a5('bum): pa shin tu rna par dag pa la mtshan mi'i gnas ma da // rnam par thar pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// mthar gyis gan
4a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
4a7('bum): ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// mngon par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// ting nge 'dzin shin tu
4a8('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// gzungs kyi sgo shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
4b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
4b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// mi 'jigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// so so
4b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// snying rje chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// sangs rgyas
4b4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
4b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin
4b6('bum): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
4b7('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can med pa'i phyir sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
4b8('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na srog med pa'i phyir srog shin tu
5a1('bum): rnam par dag pa la ba ra pa'i gnas med de// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub saras dpa' sems dpa' ren pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i ngang ru
5a2('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi der med de// rab 'dor 'di lta ste dper na gso' ba med pa'i phyir gso' ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'ber de bzhi nga byang chub sems
5a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' cher po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi der meng ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu med pa'i phyir skyes bu shir tu ra
5a4('bum): par dag pa la mtshan pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi de
5a5('bum): rang // rab 'ber 'di lta ste dper na/ gang zag med pa'i phyir gang zag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med de// rangab 'ber de bzhin du byang chub sems
5a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sde da pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi der med do// rab 'ab ra 'di lta ste dper na/ shed car med pa'i per/ sheng car
5a7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan pa'i gnas med do// rab 'bor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ngang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den
5a8('bum): meng ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shed bdag med pa'i phyir shed bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la rachar pa'i gnas med do// rab 'bar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
5b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na byed pa po ring ba'i phyir/ bad pa po shaur tu dab par dag
5b2('bum): gnas med do// rab 'bar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'bar 'di lta
5b3('bum): dper ra/ tshor ba po ring ba'i pir tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshar ba'i gnas med do// rab 'aper de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
5b4('bum): yin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor med do// rab 'bor 'di lta ste dper ra/ shes pa po med pa'i phyir shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// 
5b5('bum): rab 'bar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sa mas dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'ber 'di lta ste dpe
5b6('bum): na/ mthong ba po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshar ma'i gnas med do// rab 'bar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
5b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dod med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas red do// rab 'byor de ba
5b8('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper ra bskal pa'i ro 'bar ba'i
6a1('bum): tshe 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
6a2('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i
6a3('bum): gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
6a4('bum): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
6a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'a de lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
6a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
6a7('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol
6a8('bum): ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta
6b1('bum): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i gnas med do// 
6b2('bum): rab 'dir de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma dang
6b3('bum): ba'i 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
6b4('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang skar ma dang nor bu rin po che dang glog gi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
6b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab
6b6('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsu
6b7('bum): gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// 
6b8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mche ma'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
7a1('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas reng ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du
7a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'od
7a3('bum): la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
7a4('bum): ra/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
7a5('bum): gi don med do// rab 'bor 'di lnga ste dper na/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
7a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs lhanye pan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'bor de bzhin
7a7('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi 'od
7a8('bum): la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'bor 'di lta ste dper
7b1('bum): na tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// 
7b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
7b3('bum): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
7b4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mang do// rab 'a byor 'di lta ste dper na tshad meng snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
7b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la
7b6('bum): gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'ber 'di lta sde dper na/ 
7b7('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'bor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor med do// 
7b8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
8a1('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi bod la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
8a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi ngor med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du
8a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas
8a4('bum): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di
8a5('bum): lta ste dper na/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
8a6('bum): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
8a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
8a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
8b1('bum): chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'a
8b2('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
8b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i
8b4('bum): chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'a
8b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos tham sa cad kyi med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
8b6('bum): bos rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni ma mchis pa yang dag pa
8b7('bum): nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams
8b8('bum): cang ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa da
9a1('bum): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thur mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag
9a2('bum): ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
9a3('bum): dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
9a4('bum): 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni par shes pa mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod
9a5('bum): nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po nyams su blang ba dang ldan bu'i dngos po dang / dge
9a6('bum): ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bru can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / 
9a7('bum): rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par
9a8('bum): tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig
9b1('bum): rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang // gtong ba rjes
9b2('bum): su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs pa nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang
9b3('bum): de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i
9b4('bum): las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab
9b5('bum): 'byor 'dod pas log par g.yem ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor rdzun du smra ba ni 'jig rten pa 'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor phra ma ni 'jig rten pa'i
9b6('bum): chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor zhe gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor tshig khyal ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor chags sems ni 'jig
9b7('bum): rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor gnod sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor log par lta ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// khro ba dang nadung
9b8('bum): bar 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten
10a1('bum): pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi
10a2('bum): las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du
10a3('bum): ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// phung po rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// khams rnams ni lung du ma bsdar
10a4('bum): ba'o// skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rab 'byor de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsel pa/ 
10a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom lnga na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten ba'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu
10a6('bum): gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang // mngon par
10a7('bum): shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par/ de ma yin pa 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
10a8('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
10b1('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
10b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / 
10b3('bum): yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dbod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
10b4('bum): rig pa dang rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ 
10b5('bum): rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos par gyur pa
10b6('bum): 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ga zugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa 'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
10b7('bum): yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched le nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
10b8('bum): mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
11a1('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad pa yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa
11a2('bum): drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par
11a3('bum): thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes pod 'du shes med mir skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tsher ba 'gog pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
11a4('bum): par thar pa brgyad pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge
11a5('bum): ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dbye da ba dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gnas
11a6('bum): se// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa
11a7('bum): med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du
11a8('bum): btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam
11b1('bum): gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid ming bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa
11b2('bum): btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'dra
11b3('bum): shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te na mkha' mtha' yang skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa tham
11b4('bum): cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa
11b5('bum): thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa tha
11b6('bum): cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes
11b7('bum): med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang ste
11b8('bum): pa nyid dang / pi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
12a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang pa ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
12a2('bum): dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
12a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
12a4('bum): ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'phe
12a5('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste pung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams pa co brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi
12a6('bum): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bca sa pa'i chos shes pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
12a7('bum): zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi
12a8('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
12b1('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang
12b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
12b3('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom
12b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzug sa kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang
12b5('bum): gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas kyi khams su gtog sa pa'i rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
12b6('bum): rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang // bsam
12b7('bum): gtan ba'i dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
12b8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
13a1('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / bams pa
13a2('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus pas kyi chos shes pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'das ma byas kyi chos
13a3('bum): gang lags/ bcor ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes pa ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur po red
13a4('bum): pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba/ de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa/ de bzhin nyid chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings// chos
13a5('bum): skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'bor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun
13a6('bum): mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ber thun mong gi chos shes pa ba ni/ bsapa gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
13a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma
13a8('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
13b1('bum): ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
13b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang
13b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
13b4('bum): bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thur mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid
13b5('bum): kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags pa ra mi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos
13b6('bum): thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
13b7('bum): zhes bgyi ba/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul
13b8('bum): byed par 'gyur bas de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul byang chub sems
14a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'a
14a2('bum): sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / pir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang
14a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/ pir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'bor de ni sems
14a4('bum): can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje ldang
14a5('bum): sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges ba'i phul zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems skyed pa gang lags bcom
14a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don tu ba
14a7('bum): gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis
14a8('bum): sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems can gang yongs su mya ngan las bzla
14b1('bum): pa med pas chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyir ba drug la
14b2('bum): spang bar bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba pur sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par ba'o// bdag
14b3('bum): gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ 
14b4('bum): de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i chu la gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
14b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / rol song gi skye gan sa pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed
14b6('bum): cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad/ sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// 
14b7('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par byas te/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang
14b8('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o// zhes thabs
15a1('bum): de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi dor du sems can thams cad kyi phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du
15a2('bum): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// de nas bzod bdag gi don tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng du mas dang
15a3('bum): chub kyi tshogs mang po bstsags te/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'bor 'di ni ngang chub sems
15a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste// de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i
15a5('bum): tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad bar brlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad
15a6('bum): kyi phul du gyur pa de lta bu'i sems brlabs po ri bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems brlabs po che ni sems dang po bskyed pan chad 'dod chags kyi
15a7('bum): sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste/ 
15a8('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems brlabs po che'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang sems brlabs po che des rlob sems mi bya'o// rab 'byor
15b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye
15b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed cing des rlom sems su mi byede pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul
15b3('bum): du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'bor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// 
15b4('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la des rlom sems
15b5('bum): su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i se mas te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po
15b6('bum): nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar
15b7('bum): ba'o// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o// de la
15b8('bum): chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes pa'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste
16a1('bum): 'don chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la
16a2('bum): mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems
16a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
16a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyi da la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa
16a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gan sa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la
16a6('bum): gnas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos tham
16a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ 
16a8('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
16b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams
16b2('bum): la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ 
16b3('bum): bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas// mthar kyis
16b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa
16b5('bum): rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa
16b6('bum): rnams la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
16b7('bum): brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
16b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen pag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba
17a1('bum): bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams
17a2('bum): cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la
17a3('bum): gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od gzar
17a4('bum): rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'pha gas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi
17a5('bum): za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshig bla dag la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/  gas su rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyag rgya
17a6('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha'
17a7('bum): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la
17a8('bum): gnas rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snrel bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge
17b1('bum): la gnas/ rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 
17b2('bum): dri ba med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam
17b3('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ klog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin
17b4('bum): la gnas/ mi 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad par nga bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin
17b5('bum): la gnas/ 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ !ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la
17b6('bum): gnas/ snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lnga
17b7('bum): bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen mtha'i ting nge
17b8('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyis
18a1('bum): 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas// yi ge
18a2('bum): mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
18a3('bum): rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa
18a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ g.yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i
18a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing ga sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag
18a6('bum): yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge
18a7('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas// gcig
18a8('bum): tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'dor ba med pa'i ting nge
18b1('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ rtogs pas sred pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge
18b2('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mngon par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam
18b3('bum): pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge
18b4('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal ba dang 'gog pa
18b5('bum): thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gan sa/ 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
18b6('bum): snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ klog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
18b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
18b8('bum): nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas// gan
19a1('bum): dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang
19a2('bum): dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' lngar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing
19a3('bum): gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems
19a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la s+ho dab/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
19a5('bum): zhes pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i
19a6('bum): bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// 
19a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu don gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsel ba/ 
19a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / srog du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag
19b1('bum): tu lnga ba rab tu snang ba dang / gso' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang
19b2('bum): ba dang / bad pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba bor lta ba rab tu spang ba
19b3('bum): dang tsher ba bor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chang
19b4('bum): par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu sa da ba dang / yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / med par lnga ba rab tu spang ba dang / phung por lta bar
19b5('bum): tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyed mched du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rten cing 'a brel par 'byung ba snyabab tu spang ba dang / bden par lta bar ba
19b6('bum): tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dran pa nye bar gnag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong
19b7('bum): bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
19b8('bum): tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bder bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan du lnga ba rab tu spang ba dang / 
20a1('bum): tshad med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 
20a2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon
20a3('bum): par shes par lnga pa rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lnga ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs su lci ba rab tu spang ba dang / 
20a4('bum): mi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lnga pa rab tu spang ba dang / byams ba chen por lnga ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen po
20a5('bum): lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas
20a6('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su ldang rab tu spang ba dang / dge
20a7('bum): 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa
20a8('bum): bgyid kyang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ras tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa
20b1('bum): radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar
20b2('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 
20b3('bum): rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs
20b4('bum): su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yi na/ drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ror lta b.ra' gyur pa yin/ reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos
20b5('bum): su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i rnam par shes par lnga
20b6('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi
20b7('bum): 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 
20b8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te
21a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lnga
21a2('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba
21a3('bum): yin/ chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ me'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nam mkha'i khams su lnga bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par
21a4('bum): shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ming dang gzugs su lA
21a5('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched drug tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yid/ tshor bar lta bar 'gru ra ba yin/ sred par lnga bar 'gyur ba yin/ len par
21a6('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi
21a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin par lnga bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lnga bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par
21a8('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong bzed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byi nang stong pa nyid du lda ba
21b1('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ stong panyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta bar
21b2('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba
21b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba
21b4('bum): yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i
21b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par
21b6('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta
21b7('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par
21b8('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
22a1('bum): pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba
22a2('bum): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur
22a3('bum): nga yin/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas kyi ning
22a4('bum): yongs su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yid/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dge 'dun du
22a5('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ra lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ spras pa ro dang ldan pa rab 'byor
22a6('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshor bar
22a7('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// 'du shes su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// 
22a8('bum): rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// mig du dmigs shing darigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rna bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/ 
22b1('bum): snar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// yid du
22b2('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// drir dmigs
22b3('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed de// der dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// reg tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// chos su dmigs shing
22b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed de// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
22b5('bum): skyed do// sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// lce'i rnam par shes bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 
22b6('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// mig gi 'dus te reg par
22b7('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
22b8('bum): gyis lta bskyed do// lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi
23a1('bum): 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed de/ 
23a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 
23a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyod do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i rdul gyis lnga bskyod de// yang
23a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmi gas pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// chu'i khams su dmigs shing
23a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// ma'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed
23a6('bum): do// nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// ma reg par dmigs
23a7('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// 
23a8('bum): ming dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
23b1('bum): lnga bskyed do// tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sred par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
23b2('bum): gyis lta ba skyed de// srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rga shir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
23b3('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
23b4('bum): skyed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga pa
23b5('bum): skyed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
23b6('bum): lta ba skyed do// nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// pi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// pi rang stong pa nyid du dmigs
23b7('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dpags pa'i tshul gyis
23b8('bum): lta bskyed do// don dang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyi lta bskyed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// 'dus ma
24a1('bum): bas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
24a2('bum): do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// rang
24a3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
24a4('bum): nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmi gas pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dngos po med pa stong
24a5('bum): pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa lnga bskyed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du
24a6('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
24a7('bum): gyis lnga bskyed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// dbang por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// stobs su dmigs shing
24a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// byang chub kyi yan lag tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
24b1('bum): gyis lta bskyed do// 'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshang med par dmigs
24b2('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
24b3('bum): tshul gyis lnga ba skyed de// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med par
24b4('bum): smin pa med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mngon par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing
24b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// gzungs kyi sgra ra dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa
24b6('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mi 'jigs par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// so so yang dag par rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// byams pa
24b7('bum): chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// snying rje chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
24b8('bum): tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs
25a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// byang chub tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lha bskyed do// sangs rgyas su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// 
25a2('bum): chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// dge 'dun du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga
25a3('bum): lnga bskyed de// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lnga
25a4('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lda dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig tu lnga bar 'gyur
25a5('bum): yin/ rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta ba dang / dri
25a6('bum): lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par
25a7('bum): shes par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar
25a8('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par
25b1('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer gyis cho
25b2('bum): bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba
25b3('bum): yin/ de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par
25b4('bum): shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs su lnga pa dang / skye
25b5('bum): mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang / len par lta dang nga / srid par lta ba dang / skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lnga
25b6('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba da nga/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi
25b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi
25b8('bum): stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong
26a1('bum): pa nyid du lnga ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lnga ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lnga ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / de
26a2('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du
26a3('bum): lnga pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag par lnga
26a4('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lnga pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag du lta ba dang / 
26a5('bum): lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad med par lta ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
26a6('bum): 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
26a7('bum): par lta ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi
26a8('bum): 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba ba lung / de'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par lta bar
26b1('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo
26b2('bum): bskor bar lta pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ thabs
26b3('bum): mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i pir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don
26b4('bum): gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor khyod kyis
26b5('bum): spobs pa skyed cig/ rab 'bor gyis gsol pa/ bco ma ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tham
26b6('bum): cad dang / thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la'ang / chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
26b7('bum): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa mi mchis shing
26b8('bum): khams sum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su
27a1('bum): mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus che ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
27a2('bum): po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
27a3('bum): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po skyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba
27a4('bum): dang 'gro ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / 
27a5('bum): 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med ce nga/ rnam par dang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems
27a6('bum): med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// byang chub kyi se mas med do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
27a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam po dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin par sems so// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod
27a8('bum): kyis 'di skad du thams can mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa khongs su chud pa med pa de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
27b1('bum): de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba yang chags pa med do// 'du shes kyang chags pa med do// 'du byed kyang chags pa med do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// 
27b2('bum): mig kyang chags pa med do// rna ba yang chags pa med do// sna yang chags pa med do// lce yang chags pa med do// lus kyang chags pa med do// yid kyang chags pa med do// 
27b3('bum): gzugs kyang chags pa med do// sgra yang chags pa med do// dri yang chags pa med do// ro yang chags pa med do// reg kyang chags pa med do// chos kyang chags pa med do// 
27b4('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// sna'i rna ma par shes pa yang chags pa med do// lce'i rnam par
27b5('bum): shes pa yang chags pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang rags pa
27b6('bum): med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa med de// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa
27b7('bum): med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chags pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chags pa med do// 
27b8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chags pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chags pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chags pa
28a1('bum): med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chags pa med do// sa'i khams kyang chags pa med do// chu'i khams kyang chags pa med de/ 
28a2('bum): ma'i khams kyang chags pa med do// rlung gi khams kyang chags pa med do// nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa med de// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa med do// ma rig
28a3('bum): pa yang chags pa med do// 'du byed kyang chags pa med do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// ming dang gzugs kyang chags pa med do// skye mched drug kyang chags pa med do// 
28a4('bum): reg pa yang chags pa med do// tshor ba yang chags pa med do// sred pa yang chags pa med do// len pa yang chags pa med do// srid pa yang chags pa med do// 
28a5('bum): skye ba yang chags pa med do// rga shi yang chags pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa
28a6('bum): med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa med de// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa med do// 
28a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa med do// rang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// pi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// stong pa
28a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// 'dus
28b1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// dor ba med pa stong pa'i dkyang
28b2('bum): chags pa med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rags pa med de// mi dmigs pa stong
28b3('bum): pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med ngo // 
28b4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa med do// dbang po rnams kyang
28b5('bum): rags pa med do// stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang chags pa med do// 
28b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa med do// bsam gtan rnams kyang rags pa med do// tshad med pa rnams kyang rags pa med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
28b7('bum): kyang chags pa med do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 'di dang / 
28b8('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang chags pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang
29a1('bum): chags pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa med do// so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa
29a2('bum): med do// snying rje chen po yang chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa mang ngo // thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rag
29a3('bum): pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa med do// rab 'bor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba yang rags pa
29a4('bum): red do// 'du shes kyang chags pa med // 'du byed kyang chags pa med do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// mig kyang chags pa med de// rna ba yang chags pa med de// sna yang chags
29a5('bum): pa med do// lce yang chags pa med do// lus kyang chags pa med do// yid kyang chags pa med do// gzugs kyang chags pa med do// sgra yang rags pa med de// dri yang
29a6('bum): chags pa med do// ro yang chags pa med do// reg kyang chags pa med do// chos kyang chags pa med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa
29a7('bum): med de// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa
