54b8('bum): par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbangs rjes su sgrog go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched
55a1('bum): du rjod pa ched du rjed cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bas
55a2('bum): pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o// nes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbangs rjes su
55a3('bum): sgrog go/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang / ched du rjod pa ched du rjed cing ming yongs
55a4('bum): su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig/ sems can yongs su
55a5('bum): smir par dang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ra byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing / dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang
55a6('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang cheng du rjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgeg pa mdzad de/ 
55a7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ge cha chen po bsgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
55a8('bum): yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be
55b1('bum): ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ra/ byang
55b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis
55b3('bum): rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod par mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byed ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
55b4('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing ming yongs su sgrog par mdzad de/ 'jig rte na gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa'
55b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bus sem sa can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam
55b6('bum): par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
55b7('bum): bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod po ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
55b8('bum): go tshe chen po dgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad
56a1('bum): cing / dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
56a2('bum): bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
56a3('bum): go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig/ sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa
56a4('bum): mdzad cing / dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ 'og gi phye gas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ste de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa
56a5('bum): rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming mo ngas su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
56a6('bum): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa
56a7('bum): mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa
56a8('bum): cheng du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig
56b1('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs sgrog go// smras pa ched
56b2('bum): ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
56b3('bum): be ni gang yin gang pos smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dre
56b4('bum): bas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa// rtog ba dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam
56b5('bum): gtan pa dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rna ma par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig du
56b6('bum): gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 
56b7('bum): de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang / bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang
56b8('bum): ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs
57a1('bum): sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang mang sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ bdang snam
57a2('bum): dang dran pas/ bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bslus te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ gcugs
57a3('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldad pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs
57a4('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs
57a5('bum): mad pa/ gnod pa med pa ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten sa kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ rdzanam mkha'i mthas
57a6('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' bdang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ 
57a7('bum): gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
57a8('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pal
57b1('bum): gnyis pa tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa ldod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'
57b2('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ 
57b3('bum): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas ske mched la nye bar bsgru
57b4('bum): de gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam she sa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
57b5('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma med de zhes cung zad mong pa'i sku
57b6('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mir skye mched la mi dmigs
57b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan de nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag
57b8('bum): dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gnog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang
58a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'dzin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de tshul khrim
58a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can// bsam
58a3('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar ni nas rang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par
58a4('bum): rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dbod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gang na ga nyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga'
58a5('bum): ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myed la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang
58a6('bum): ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang
58a7('bum): spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas
58a8('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod
58b1('bum): pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings klag pas/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
58b2('bum): bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa
58b3('bum): med pa/ ltong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
58b4('bum): bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin/ langs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs
58b5('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'ja garten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'
58b6('bum): mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po
58b7('bum): shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten ches kyi
58b8('bum): dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod ngo // de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
59a1('bum): shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ 
59a2('bum): mkha'i mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
59a3('bum): 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mdang las
59a4('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye ma tshang las
59a5('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar ba sgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni dang chub sems dpa' sems
59a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i brtsam gang na de rim byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la ra
59a7('bum): mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par zhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
59a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rdog pa dang bcas
59b1('bum): pa/ dped pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa
59b2('bum): bar ni nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba cam
59b3('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus
59b4('bum): kyis med la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o// sa brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsapa gtan gsum
59b5('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal po yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang rub pas
59b6('bum): bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po
59b7('bum): shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldong pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten ches kyi dbyings kyis
59b8('bum): klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya rer po shin tu yangs pa
60a1('bum): mi gnyis pa/ chang red pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten res kyi
60a2('bum): darings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i pags bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par skyed do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya cher po shin tu yangs
60a3('bum): pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas// 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ ra
60a4('bum): mnga'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu
60a5('bum): yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ljong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi
60a6('bum): dbyis kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang
60a7('bum): dag par 'das te/ thegs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
60a8('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas
60b1('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad pa yod ngo zhes cung zad med pa'i sku mched la
60b2('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
60b3('bum): gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang
60b4('bum): tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa
60b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
60b6('bum): la spyod cing // 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i res kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dber pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
60b7('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa rdeg pa dang / rnam par dped pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dag ste/ sam
60b8('bum): kyi rgyud gcig du gyur pos rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nya
61a1('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ drad pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang bsems su gnas pa/ ba
61a2('bum): lus kyis med la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par sbed pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gangar gsum pa
61a3('bum): la 'a bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang pad sdug bsngal ba
61a4('bum): yang med pa bdang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dmas pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa me gnyis pa
61a5('bum): rang med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ ram
61a6('bum): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod de// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ chang
61a7('bum): med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten ches kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
61a8('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa me gnyis pa/ tshad med pa
61b1('bum): gcugs med pa/ gnong ba med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i
61b2('bum): legs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spong ngo // de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis
61b3('bum): pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ na mkha'i
61b4('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mes par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
61b5('bum): 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pa sa/ nam mkha' mthas so zhes te/ nam mkha'
61b6('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas
61b7('bum): so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad pa
61b8('bum): yod do// zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgribs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med
62a1('bum): 'du shes med mir skye mched la me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis re bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan de'i bas pa ga
62a2('bum): sde nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ ram mkha'i rnam pa dang
62a3('bum): rdul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
62a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bsam gang na gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dper sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dber pa rdeg pa dang
62a5('bum): bcas pa dped pa dang bcas pa/ dper ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par
62a6('bum): rtog pa dang / rnam par dbong pa nye bar zhi nas rang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dbyed pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin
62a7('bum): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dra pa dang ldan zhing shes
62a8('bum): bzhin du bdang snyems su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myeng la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ bdang snyems pa'i zhes brjed pa snga
62b1('bum): dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing // yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang
62b2('bum): nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin
62b3('bum): tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
62b4('bum): klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa
62b5('bum): mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzog sa pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
62b6('bum): kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par sprod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shir tu
62b7('bum): yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
62b8('bum): klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par sbed do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i
63a1('bum): sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldad pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin
63a2('bum): bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i pheg bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par bas shing rnam par sbed do// de rnam pa
63a3('bum): cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna rigs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ ram mkha' mtha'
63a4('bum): yas so zhes te/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cang du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang da
63a5('bum): par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gan sa so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'
63a6('bum): yas sku mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod de zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad meng po'i skyer
63a7('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min ske ma da la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
63a8('bum): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa
63b1('bum): dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gnog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sde nga 'di ni/ byang
63b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben
63b3('bum): pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dped pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog
63b4('bum): pa dang dped pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga'
63b5('bum): ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin
63b6('bum): tu btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis mong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga'
63b7('bum): ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang rung
63b8('bum): bas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa sam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po
64a1('bum): shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas
64a2('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de stong rje dang ldan pa'i
64a3('bum): sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas// 'jig
64a4('bum): rderan chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i
64a5('bum): sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms
64a6('bum): pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i pags bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spong ngo // de mi dmigs
64a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltong pa med pa/ yongs su
64a8('bum): rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par
64b1('bum): spyad de// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam
64b2('bum): mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par
64b3('bum): shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung
64b4('bum): zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgru bas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes
64b5('bum): meng 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gang
64b6('bum): te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / 
64b7('bum): tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po
64b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes pa'o// 
65a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bugag sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa pa gnas
65a2('bum): tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldad pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten ches kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
65a3('bum): gtugs pa'i legs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mes par byas shing rnam par sbed do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa
65a4('bum): gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam ma'a'i
65a5('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba da nga ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis
65a6('bum): pa tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
65a7('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par bas shing rnam par spyod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis
65a8('bum): pa tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klag pa/ nam mkha'i
65b1('bum): mthas gtug pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dper sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rdog pa dang bcas dpyod pa
65b2('bum): dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas
65b3('bum): nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can// 
65b4('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te
65b5('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyi sa de la dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa bdang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba
65b6('bum): med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kya
65b7('bum): nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam
65b8('bum): pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi bde bas/ ram la
66a1('bum): mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du ram mkha' mtha' yas sku mched las
66a2('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
66a3('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das pa/ 
66a4('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrub sa te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
66a5('bum): chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyor mongs pa rab tu spong ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang
66a6('bum): gzugs meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing / 'chad pa dang ston cing 'grel pa la rnam par 'bad cing / gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang de dag gi skyen dang / 'byung
66a7('bum): ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
66a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing // rnam par
66b1('bum): ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas kyi yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi
66b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ bsam gtan dang tshad meng
66b3('bum): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems
66b4('bum): shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rdeg ba dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa
66b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da nga ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsapa gtan dang tshang med pa dang
66b6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus rnam par byed
66b7('bum): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
66b8('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhag cing // rnam par ldang yang 'an thos kyi sa 'a
67a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'dir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa
67a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gangan
67a3('bum): gsum pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i yan lag dang / bams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyems dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes
67a4('bum): ratha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag
67a5('bum): med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rdeg kyang / bsam
67a6('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlo ma sems su mi bad pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa sems
67a7('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i theg
67a8('bum): pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ske
67b1('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bani sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga sgom pa dang / 
67b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom
67b3('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams
67b4('bum): skem pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skem pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam
67b5('bum): pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa rnams skem pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
67b6('bum): smor pa med pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs
67b7('bum): kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
67b8('bum): cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
68a1('bum): du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa she bci
68a2('bum): sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skem pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'o// 
68a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad la yongs su
68a4('bum): bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gdog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do// 
68a5('bum): dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bad gnyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// bdang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la ma'am par
68a6('bum): gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa bzod par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha
68a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par
68a8('bum): ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sngo ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa
68b1('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
68b2('bum): par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing
68b3('bum): dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
68b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tsho gas par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam
68b5('bum): par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa'
68b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la'ang / mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang
68b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
68b8('bum): bo chang med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 
69a1('bum): bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang la de dag la mi rtag pa
69a2('bum): rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / spen pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu
69a3('bum): rdog kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyen med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
69a4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
69a5('bum): po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ pi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ pi nang stong pa 'di shes kyang dmi
69a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyi nga dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ den pa
69a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshu
69a8('bum): gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ der ba ming
69b1('bum): pa stong pa 'di shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul
69b2('bum): gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
69b3('bum): shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul
69b4('bum): gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa che na po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bang
69b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rang
69b6('bum): ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ri/ 
69b7('bum): rtag ces pa bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya bar she pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces
69b8('bum): ba bar shes pa mi 'jug/ bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
70a1('bum): 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
70a2('bum): sems dpa' rin po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi bde la/ 'ded pa dang gzugs dang
70a3('bum): gzugs meng ba'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ 
70a4('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang
70a5('bum): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos da nga / 'dus mi byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das
70a6('bum): pa'i ros mi shes pa 'ang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang 'dus pas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
70a7('bum): bu 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
70a8('bum): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbeng
70b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs
70b2('bum): len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
70b3('bum): yang dag par gnas zhes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
70b4('bum): tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des tshul khrims kya nga mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi
70b5('bum): dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha
70b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod
70b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs yid la ba
70b8('bum): ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes pa'o// me dang
71a1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ brtser 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
71a2('bum): la yang dag par gnas kyang des brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la ba ba de
71a3('bum): ngag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes pa'o// 
71a4('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag pa
71a5('bum): gnas kyang // des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs / byang chub sems dpa' yang mau dmigs/ yid la
71a6('bum): bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes
71a7('bum): ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
71a8('bum): gnas kyang / nges dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs// mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang ba
71b1('bum): ba dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs yid la bya
71b2('bum): ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes pa'o// / 
71b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa/ rnam par
71b4('bum): bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bab ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par
71b5('bum): bsgom pa'i don du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pi stong pa nying bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da nga ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa/ rnam
71b6('bum): par bsgom pa'i dor du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
71b7('bum): pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyidi stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgor
71b8('bum): pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
72a1('bum): pa'i dor du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar 'dres pas
72a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'dus pas stong pa nyid bsgom me// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
72a3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
72a4('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkho na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
72a5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
72a6('bum): 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom me// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
72a7('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
72a8('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'dres pas
72b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsdeb pa'i der du de la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshar nyid sbeng pa'ing bskam mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la byab pa 'dres pas
72b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i dor du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa
72b3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
72b4('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ ngo bo nying steng pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad ma' na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bab ma 'dres pas bsku
72b5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'i den du nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gnar yang bang rab sem
72b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mayin pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa bar ga
72b7('bum): pa bzhi skem me// rnam pa thams cad maben pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i der du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong bar
72b8('bum): bsngam la// rnam pa thams cad malen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i rin du l-i dmigs pa'i rdul rtsis rdza 'bas kyi rang pa ban
73a1('bum): bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang
73a2('bum): lnga bsgom me// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga bsgril me/ 
73a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// rnam
73a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'a dris pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de ming mi gas pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
73a5('bum): pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa
73a6('bum): bden pa bzhi sgeb mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi bsgom
73a7('bum): mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa
73a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid le bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'o snyems par 'jug pa bani snga
73b1('bum): me rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad skem mo// rna pa
73b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
73b3('bum): bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mi
73b4('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin skem mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du nga mi
73b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i ngan
73b6('bum): du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i den du de mi
73b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
73b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i dor du de
74a1('bum): pi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba pa 'dres pas bsgob pa rnam par bsgrub pa
74a2('bum): dan du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom me// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i der
74a3('bum): du nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po skem me// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgreb pa'i der du de mi dmigs pa'i
74a4('bum): tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la yang dag
74a5('bum): par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ga na na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir
74a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni/ tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i por/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ri bong tsam du zad de// / 
74a7('bum): tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'dir ming tsam du zad do// 'du shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du shes shes bya ba 'ang ro ming tsam du zad de// 'du byed
74a8('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'dini ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mong tsam du zad de/ 
74b1('bum): mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig ces bya ba 'di ri ming tsam du zad do// rna ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming du zad do// snga dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 
74b2('bum): sna zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de// lus dmigs su med pa'i pir/ lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
74b3('bum): du zad do// yid dmigs su med pa'i pir/ yid zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ri ming tsam du zad do// sgra
74b4('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dri dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dri zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// re dmigs su med
74b5('bum): pa'i pir/ ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// reg dmigs su med pa'i pir/ reg ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ches dmigs su med pa'i phyir
74b6('bum): ches zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de// mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ri ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i rnam par
74b7('bum): shes pa dmigs su med pa'i per/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa
74b8('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ring tsam du zad ngo // lus kyi rnam par she
75a1('bum): pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su meng ba'i phyir
75a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 
75a3('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ snga'i 'dus te reg
75a4('bum): pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te ra ga pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de// lus
75a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'du sa te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid
75a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher
75a7('bum): ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'a
75a8('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 
75b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
75b2('bum): ba'i tshor ba dmigs su meng ba'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su
75b3('bum): mang pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni mang
75b4('bum): tsam du zad de// chu'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// me'i khams dmigs su med pa'i pir/ ma'i khams rna
75b5('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rlung gi khams dmig sa su med pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam mkha'i khams dmigs
75b6('bum): med pa'i pir/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni
75b7('bum): ming tsam du zad do// ma rig pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed zhes bya ba 'di
75b8('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ming dang gzugs dmigs su med pa
76a1('bum): bIr/ ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad // skye mched drug dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de/ 
76a2('bum): reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tsher ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // sred pa dmigs su ma
76a3('bum): pa'i pir/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// len pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// srid pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir
76a4('bum): srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye ba dmig sa su med pa'i phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rga shi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rga shi
76a5('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pharo/ la tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 
76a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i pir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su
76a7('bum): med pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phan
76a8('bum): pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de/ 
76b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang
76b2('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// pi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su
76b3('bum): med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni maung tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
76b4('bum): du zad do// chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su
76b5('bum): med pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming
76b6('bum): tsam du zad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
76b7('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ thog ma
76b8('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
77a1('bum): zad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid
77a2('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
77a3('bum): nyid ces bya ba 'di ni maung tsam du zad do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa
77a4('bum): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'dini ming tsam du zad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
77a5('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i be nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
77a6('bum): du zad do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su med pa'i
77a7('bum): phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad
77a8('bum): dau/ dbang po rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
77b1('bum): du zad do// byang chub kyi yang lag rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 
77b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes
77b3('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 
77b4('bum): tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
77b5('bum): ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mthar gyis
77b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
77b7('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 
77b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di
78a1('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi skye zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
78a2('bum): rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni bong tsang zad do// mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i pir/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
78a3('bum): ba ba 'di ri ming tsam du zad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su meng ba'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// snying rje cher po dang
78a4('bum): su red pa'i phyir/ sdong rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni ring tsar du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
78a5('bum): pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ri ming tsam du zad do// de bzhi na nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
78a6('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces
78a7('bum): bya ba 'di ni ring tsam du zad do// chos nyid darigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i pir/ chos kyi dbyings
78a8('bum): shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos kyi gnas nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos skyon med pa dmigs su med pa'i
78b1('bum): phyir/ ches skyen med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bang chub dmigs
78b2('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar yang dag par
78b3('bum): shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes pa'o// 
78b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gnar yang byang chub sems dpa'
78b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing sems can
78b6('bum): yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim gro ba ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim
78b7('bum): ba ba dang / bkur bstir ba ba dang / pu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de pa
78b8('bum): las kyang 'di lta s+t+wa~M/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi ning nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ring du 'gro dang / 
79a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su spar bar byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'ang
79a2('bum): shes kyang mi 'byung sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas zhing lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don pa pa'i mthu yeng ba de lta bu'i lus ched du bsam
79a3('bum): shing yongs su 'dzin to// de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
79a4('bum): theb nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam khA lding dang / mi 'am tsau dang / lto 'ape cher
79a5('bum): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu / ra ro// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
79a6('bum): tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon taran rjod pa mdzad ceng
79a7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thag po chen po bla na med pa yi theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes pa ba zhig rnam pa thams cad
79a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjed pa mdzad do// lde phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
79b1('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge me zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
79b2('bum): dpa' chen po thag pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg tshig la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos
79b3('bum): 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
79b4('bum): bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la
79b5('bum): gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkha na pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da theb nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags
79b6('bum): sgeg cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// bang pogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa
79b7('bum): mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes pa bzhig
79b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbangs su rjed pa mdzad do// bang shar
80a1('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjed pa mdzad cing / 'jig
80a2('bum): gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob sa
80a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo sker ba byed do// zhes grags pa sgeg cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
80a4('bum): ga'i klung gi be ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjed pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems
80a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i the ga pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes pa bzhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid theb ste/ rnam pa thams cad
80a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor le skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// lce nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed
80a7('bum): ngag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge ma zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen
80a8('bum): po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes pa ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor le skor
80b1('bum): babed de zhes grags pa sgeg cing dbangs su rjod pa mdzad de// nub byang gi pogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bem snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu
80b2('bum): pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge me zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa
80b3('bum): 'di zhes pa bzhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi theb ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbangs su rjod pa mdzad
80b4('bum): do/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rjen gyi khams
80b5('bum): che ge me zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad
80b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid theb ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bad de zhes grags pa skrag cing // dbangs su rjed pa mdzad ngo // steng gi pags kyi
80b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs po rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rjer gyi khams che ge re zhig du byang chub
80b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams
81a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgeg cing dbangs su rjed pa mdzad do// de ltar ra/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
81a2('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa po 'ang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// btsem
81a3('bum): ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so// go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go mcher po bgos zhes
81a4('bum): bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'ber 'di la bang chub sems dpa' sems
81a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i go cha gyen cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glor bgos/ bzod pa'i
81a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bges/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha
81a7('bum): bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ pi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bges/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi sa
81a8('bum): cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go ma bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bges/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyi
81b1('bum): kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong pa
81b2('bum): nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi gar bgos/ ngo bo nyid stong
81b3('bum): pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
81b4('bum): rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang po'i go cha bgos/ sto bas kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gaM go ma bgos/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bder dag
81b5('bum): babrebs pa pa kyig tshad med pa'i go cha bgos/ gzug sa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ mthar gyis gnas pa
81b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i gor bges
81b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/ gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go ma bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bges/ so so yang dag par rig
81b8('bum): pa'i ge ma bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go ma bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ge cha bags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ge mang gis/ sangs
82a1('bum): rgyas kyi sku'i go cha dgos nas stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar legs kyi 'jig rjer gyi khams
82a2('bum): ga'i klung gi be ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lde phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub phyogs kyi 'jig
82a3('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// bang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// 
82a4('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rter gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyid snang bas rgyas par 'geng sa so// shar lde'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
82a5('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rjen gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed snang bas rgyas
82a6('bum): par 'gangs so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
82a7('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum
82a8('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du rab tu bskyed do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod de//
